quoteDocument.executiveSummary: This quote details the cost for creating a custom cake and assorted pastries for Sarah's 30th birthday celebration, themed as an elegant garden party. Jikky's Bake House will provide a stunning, nut-free cake and 40 pastries, delivered to your San Francisco venue two hours before the event. Our 15 years of experience ensures a high-quality product that perfectly complements your special occasion.

serviceBreakdown.description: One (1) custom-designed cake tailored to the 'Elegant Garden Party' theme with pastel colors. Nut-free.
Forty (40) assorted pastries, nut-free, complementing the cake's theme.

termsAndConditions: A 50% deposit is required upon acceptance of this quote to secure the order.
The remaining 50% balance is due upon delivery.
Jikky's Bake House is not responsible for any damages to the cake or pastries after delivery.
Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the event will result in forfeiture of the deposit.
All prices are in USD and include applicable taxes.
Delivery is included within the San Francisco, CA area. Additional fees may apply for areas outside of this region.
We require the precise delivery address and event start time to ensure timely delivery.
quoteDocument.paymentTerms: 50% deposit is due upon acceptance of the quote. The remaining balance is due upon delivery of the cake and pastries.
quoteDocument.deliveryTimeline: The cake and pastries will be delivered to the specified venue in San Francisco, CA, two hours prior to the event start time, within one week of order confirmation.
quoteDocument.nextSteps: Please review this quote carefully. If you have any questions, please contact us at [Contact Information]. To accept this quote, please confirm your acceptance and provide the required 50% deposit via [Payment Method(s)]. Once we receive confirmation and deposit, we will commence production of your order.

keyHighlights: Custom-designed cake tailored to your specific theme and requirements.
High-quality, delicious pastries to complement your cake.
Nut-free options to accommodate guest allergies.
Reliable and timely delivery to your chosen venue.
15+ years of experience in creating exquisite baked goods.
presentation.valueProposition: Jikky's Bake House will provide a memorable culinary experience for Sarah's 30th birthday, creating a visually stunning and delicious centerpiece for your elegant garden party celebration. Our expertise ensures the highest quality and attention to detail, exceeding your expectations and making your event truly special.
competitiveAdvantages: 15 years of experience and established reputation.
Commitment to high-quality ingredients and meticulous craftsmanship.
Flexible and reliable service tailored to meet your specific needs.
